text: Ambassador @NikkiHaley has been a trailblazer ever since she was Governor of our home state of South Carolina. Her seamless transition from the Governor’s Office to the United Nations is a testament to her undaunted love for our country. (1/2)
Prayers with our friends down in Florida as #HurricaneMichael approaches.
South Carolina’s maternal mortality rate is specifically higher than the national average, with 26.5 deaths for 100,000 live births as opposed to 20.7 nationwide.
